title: My mod (IT'S FINISHED!!)
content:
I've emailed it to Xkyrauh twice... Basicaly because I didn't compleate the message on my first email of it...[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img] It needs levels... and I'm bad at levels...[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] Basicaly, my levels are n00b easy...[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img] Can someone email me levels at [url=mailto:HarveySmiths3rdemail.com] HarveySmiths3rdemail.com[/url]?[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] Also, I can't decide If I want to change the ending picture or not... Maybe I could just post a poll about it... Well, atleast I've released the beta version of my mod.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img] Please report it's glitches to me.-------------------
A proud member of the beta testing society
[url=http://www.garfield.com/comics/comics_todays.html]www.garfield.com/comics/comics_todays.html[/url]
Down with VGA! Up with EGA!
Email me a beta at [url=mailto:HarveySmiths3rdemail@hotmail.com] HarveySmiths3rdemail@hotmail.com[/url]! :-)

title: Re: My mod (currently a beta)
content: Well, I don't concern it being very much released if Xky is the only one having his hands on it..You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: My mod (currently a beta)
content:
1.) Mail me the mod at six_different_people@hotmail.com

2.) Wait

3.) Levels will be produced.

Please specify difficulty level wanted, and any tiles\themes you want repeatedly used, level size would be appreciated too.A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: well...
content: Yeah, mailing it to LevelLord is probably the best idea.
